title: SJB to take disciplinary action against Harin, Manusha
body_lines: Disciplinary action would be taken SJB MPs Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakkara who were sworn in as Ministers, Chief Opposition Whip Lakshman Kiriella said today.
He told Parliament that the SJB had earlier decided to support the government in constructive proposals without taking up ministerial positions.(Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
